CustomField.formula:
IF( Apps_Proactive_Opportunity__c = FALSE, '',
IF( OR( TEXT(StageName)='0 - Planning', AND(Meeting_Booked__c = FALSE , TEXT(StageName)='1 - Possibility')), 'Planlagt (ikke kontaktet)',
IF( AND(Meeting_Booked__c = TRUE , TEXT(StageName)='1 - Possibility'), 'Pågår (møter/tilbud)',
IF(AND( OR(TEXT(StageName)='2 - RFI', TEXT(StageName)='3 - Prequal', TEXT(StageName)='4 - Offer'), TEXT(Status__c)='In Progress'), 'Pågår (møter/tilbud)',
IF(AND( OR(TEXT(StageName)='2 - RFI', TEXT(StageName)='3 - Prequal', TEXT(StageName)='4 - Offer'), TEXT(Status__c)='Sent'), 'Venter på tilbakemelding',
IF(OR(TEXT(StageName)='5 - Awarded', TEXT(StageName)='Closed Won'), 'Vunnet',
IF(OR(TEXT(StageName)='Closed Lost', TEXT(StageName)='Abandoned by Us',TEXT(StageName)='Abandoned by Customer'), 'Avsluttet', '' )))))))
CustomField.label: Apps Sales Progress
